name: RTap
description:
Is a third person shooter multiplayer game like CSGO , you don't require Hamachi but steam is needed to play. You are in someone team and must kill the enemy team to win the match. You can use some powerup (like heal, shield or dmg boost)with right click or use the simple shoot with left click.

you can join the official discord server  https://discord.gg/M7uCqXyk
